item.title: Slice_1
item.description: The struct of slice in go: 1type slice struct { 2 array unsafe.Pointer 3 len int 4 cap int 5} 1package main 2 3import "fmt" 4 5func main() { 6 a := make([]int, 10, 20) 7 for i := 0; i < 10; i = i + 1 { 8 a[i] = i 9 } 10 11 // means the length of b is 6-3=3, the capicity is 9-3=6 12 b := a[3:6:9] 13 // len(b)=3 14 fmt.
